title: BBC Local Live: York and North Yorkshire on Wednesday 9 November 2016 - BBC News
summary: news , sport , weather and travel updates resume at 07:00 on thursday .
cat found dead in harrogate with severed tail and ear .
volunteers 'devastated ' by fire in historic york house .
snow affects some parts of north yorkshire .
york barracks replacement should form 'heritage of future ' .

documents.title: five things we learnt today in north yorkshire
text: well that 's about all we 've got time for today - thanks for spending the last few hours in our company .
we 're back again with our local live service from 07:00 on thursday .
in the meantime , here are five things we 've learnt in north yorkshire today :
as we 've had so many beautiful of the wintry weather sent in today i thought we should end with another couple .
the royal horticultural society sent in these twostunners of their gardens at harlow carr in harrogate .
author: Andrew Barton
BBC Local Live, York

documents.title: watch : are we in in for more snow fall ?
text: so are we in for more snow ?
here 's the latest :
author: Owain Wyn Evans
Weather presenter, BBC Look North

documents.title: frozen in time : images of north yorkshire under snow
text: our bbc weather watchers have sprung into action all over the county this morning , spurred on by their desire to capture meteorological marvels , such as the wet and white powdery stuff that descended over night .
emma 's dales captured the solitary stone building sticking out of the white landscape in hawes .
the panorama of askrigg was sent in by phoebes photos while jane sent in a pic of her pooch enjoying `` a lovely start to the morning '' at the top of sutton bank .
author: Andrew Barton
BBC Local Live, York

documents.title: stadium delay could hit internationals
text: stadium delay could hit internationals

documents.title: the secrets of fylingdales in the heat of the cold war
text: these are from a rare press visit inside fylingdales early warning station on the north york moors in 1964 .
it was only in 1963 that it was named one of three radar sites in the ballistic missile early warning system .
author: Yorkshire Post

documents.title: north yorkshire 's weather : showers and bright spells this afternoon
text: any rain will turn to showers along the coast this afternoon , with a few bright spells .
still feeling chilly , top temperatures of around 4c ( 39f ) .

documents.title: your headlines this lunchtime
text: the top stories from our york newsroom this lunchtime include :
author: BBC Radio York

documents.title: volunteers 'devastated ' by fire in historic york park lodge
text: volunteers who 've spent the last four years working to restore an historic house in one of york 's parks say they 're `` devastated '' after a fire gutted it last night .
four fire crews attended the blaze at west bank park in acomb , and teams returned earlier today along with a fire investigator after flames were seen coming from the roof .
the building is the site of a proposed heritage centre and cafe , commemorating the work of james backhouse , who ran his world famous plant nurseries there in the 18th century .
they became known as the kew gardens of the north .
jane cullen ( above outside the park keeper 's lodge before the fire ) is the founder of the west bank park heritage project .
she says the community project had just secured money from the heritage lottery fund to look at the feasibility of their plans .
meanwhile , laura outhart , from the project , has told me the fire marks `` a very sad day '' for all those involved in the project :
the lodge building has a link with the famous backhouse nurseries and is a familiar landmark in our park .
this project is about building pride in our community and protecting the future of our park . ''
author: Andrew Barton
BBC Local Live, York

documents.title: watch : winning the title is a walk in the park
text: one of north yorkshire 's parks might be about to be declared the uk 's best park .
five of the county 's parks have been nominated : two of them are in knaresborough - the castle gardens and bebra gardens - and there are also harrogate 's valley gardens and homestead park in york .
another north yorkshire park tipped for the top is ripon 's spa gardens .
i 've been there this morning and though i could n't lure anyone out to talk to me due to the inclement weather , as you 'll see the snow just adds a layer of beauty :
over 200 parks nationally are in the running , and the winner is revealed at the end of the month .
author: Joanita Musisi
Reporter, BBC Radio York

documents.title: man held over murder of yorkshire schoolgirl
text: a 63-year-old man remains in custody after being arrested on sus of the murder of a yorkshire schoolgirl over 20 years ago .
lindsey jo rimer went missing in hebden bridge in november 1994 after going out to a local shop .
her body was found in a canal five months later .
police made a renewed appeal for help last week .
author: Nathan Turvey
BBC Radio York News

documents.title: the cost of taking away east coast rubbish
text: far more people than expected have agreed to pay to have their garden rubbish taken away in the scarborough , whitby and filey areas .
more than 17,000 people signed up to the scheme when scarborough borough council introduced a fee for the first time this year - it had been predicting only 8,000 would join .
the council is now expected to keep the price down for next year .
author: Andrew Barton
BBC Local Live, York

documents.title: old lodge in york goes up in flames
text: we 've just received this from the press of the fire in york 's west bank park which devastated a derelict building overnight and which fire crews have now returned to .
the fire gutted a former park keeper 's lodge , which is the site of a proposed heritage centre and cafe .
picture : the press , york , thepress.co.uk
crews were originally called out to the empty building on new lane in acomb at about 18:00 last night .
they 've returned there again today , after flames were seen coming from the old lodge roof .

documents.title: fire reignites at scene of overnight blaze in york
text: firefighters have returned to west bank park in york , after flames were seen coming from the old lodge roof .
on tuesday night , a severe blaze devastated the derelict building - a former park keeper 's lodge - which is the site of a proposed heritage centre and cafe .
crews were originally called out to the empty building on new lane in acomb at about 18:00 last night .

documents.title: trumped by snow - or a trumpkin ?
text: congratulations to ed in harrogate for managing to encapsulate the two big stories of the day in one pic
ed says : `` my trumpkin has grey hair already ! ''
author: Andrew Barton
BBC Local Live, York

documents.title: traffic and travel update : snow cleared on a1
text: driving conditions have returned to normal on the a1 in both directions .
conditions were described as hazardous earlier between j51 , a1 ( leeming bar ) and j56 , b6275 ( barton ) because of snow , but that 's now been cleared .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: weather watchers : walking in a winter wonderland
text: i hesitate to mention the festive season , but our bbc weather watchers are sending in which suggest it 's begining to look a lot like christmas !

contenders for best personalised christmas card in this montage include , from top left clockwise , mrs shels ' trees in hovingham , paul 's pic of scotch corner , scotty 's pic of richmond and burtersett brian 's shot of snow in hawes :
you can send in your entries .
via twitter , facebook or email .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: listen : americans in north yorkshire react to trump victory
text: donald trump has won the race to become the next president of the united states of america .
the republican billionaire has congratulated democrat candidate hillary clinton on her campaign and said he will seek partnership and not conflict around the world .
rose drew , an american who lives in york but who travelled back to the usa to vote for hillary clinton in the election , has spoken to bbc radio york about her reaction to the news :
meanwhile , kim hodgson , an american who lives in filey , has told bbc radio york the people of america have voted for the republican party rather than donald trump :
author: Andrew Barton
BBC Local Live, York

documents.title: traffic and travel update : accidents , roadworks and snow causing delays
text: there are a few travel hotspots to make you aware of in the county at the moment :
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: cat found dead in harrogate with severed tail and ear
text: a cat with its tail and right ear severed has been found dead in a park in harrogate .
the ginger cat , which was called max and had been missing for 10 months , was found on sunday in the park between roberts crescent and knapping hill .
vets believe that his tail and ear were deliberately severed .
max , above before his disappearance , is described as ginger with white paws , long white `` socks '' on his back legs and a white patch on his chest .
after being missing for so long , max 's owners say they were `` resigned '' to the fact they would probably not see him again , but were `` horrified '' after finding out what had happened to him .
police want to speak to anyone who has any information about where max has been for the past 10 months or has any information about who is responsible for attacking him .
author: Andrew Barton
BBC Local Live, York

documents.title: first snow of winter falls in york and north yorkshire
text: the first snow of winter has fallen in york and north yorkshire , making driving conditions difficult in some hillier locations .
this image , taken from a webcam operated by north yorkshire county council , shows snowfall this morning at sutton bank , near helmsley .
author: The Press

documents.title: man arrested over selby sex assault
text: a man in his twenties has been arrested in connection with a sexual assault in selby .
the attack happened in the early hours of sunday morning , when a woman in her thirties was assaulted in a car park in the town centre .
the arrest was made following the publication of cctv images by north yorkshire police .
the arrested man remains in custody for questioning .
author: Nathan Turvey
BBC Radio York News

documents.title: watch : is there a right way to wear a poppy ?
text: if you 've any concerns as we approach remembrance sunday about whether you 're wearing your poppy properly , take a look at this quick video from the royal british legion :
author: Andrew Barton
BBC Local Live, York

documents.title: listen : replacement for york army barracks should form 'heritage of the future '
text: the news is still sinking in that a number of army bases in north yorkshire are to close , including imphal barracks in york
there 's been a military base in fulford since 1795 , but now the landmark barracks is to be sold and is listed as having housing potential .
dr david fraser , chief executive of york civic trust , has told me that any new development on the military sites `` must be done sympathetically '' .
he says he hopes the historic buildings of the barracks will be retained :
author: Georgey Spanswick
Presenter, BBC Radio York

documents.title: a clever angle on the weather
text: here 's a clever way of catching your attention so you read an important message : use a pic of a beautiful old ford anglia
we 've been told we might be getting snow going out in the car s-slow down n-is the trip necessary o-observe distances w-wrap up warm
i think it is , i have to admit it is a pic from google
it 's one place i have always said i really want to go but i 've not got there yet
love the
@ twitterid be all gone by morning why is everyone panicking
yep that 's the spirit first hint of some white stuff and go into overdrive .
and leave the anglia where it is ?
a nice old patrol car in that photo

documents.title: north yorkshire 's weather : a cold and snowy start
text: a cloudy start to the day with outbreaks of rain , sleet and snow continuing for a time .
the snow mainly confined to high ground , but a few heavy bursts could reach lower levels for a time .
watch my full forecast here :

documents.title: traffic and travel update : hazardous driving conditions in harrogate
text: there are slow traffic and hazardous driving conditions on the a61 leeds road southbound in harrogate , between the park drive junction and the pannal bank junction , because of snow .
drivers are being warned to take particular care in the area .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: cold as ice ? snow falls on north yorkshire
text: i 've just asked bbc radio york 's listeners to let me know if it was snowing in their area and within seconds these two arrived .
thanks to will and ellie in melsonby for sending me them .
they say : `` these photos have been taken out of our bedroom windows .
two and half inches and still falling ! ''
author: Georgey Spanswick
Presenter, BBC Radio York

documents.title: goodbye autumn , hello winter
text: it looks like the swaledale mountain and cave rescue team have spotted some of the white stuff where they are .
winter has arrived in upper swaledale !
will there be enough to get our skis out tomorrow ? ? ?
author: Andrew Barton
BBC Local Live, York

text: a few roads in north yorkshire and on the border with west yorkshire are currently being affected by snow :
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: north yorkshire 's weather : rain , sleet and snow
text: it 's a wet and white one this morning .
the rain , sleet and snow will continue into the morning with further snow possible in southern and western areas of the region .
this will gradually clear eastwards through the afternoon , although it will remain cold and rather cloudy .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: traffic and travel : hazardous conditions on the a1
text: we 'll keep you updated today with the driving conditions around the county as the forecast rain , sleet and snow continues .
at the moment on the a1 there are hazardous driving conditions in both directions between j51 , a1 ( leeming bar ) and j56 , b6275 ( barton ) , because of snow .
drivers are being warned to approach with care .
meanwhile on the trains , the live departure board at york railway station , is showing all services are currently running to time .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live coverage
text: i 'll be with you until 14:30 with all the latest news , sport , weather and travel from across north yorkshire .
we 're starting a little earlier today as snow 's been falling over parts of north yorkshire and i want to keep you in touch with the current situation .
there are fewer wintry white bbc weather watcher in the inbox than i expected this morning , but it does look like the forecast snow has reached several places so far .
here 's what it 's like where daley 's sky lives in newsham ( left ) and bilton view in harrogate says `` laying snow in north harrogate - a good inch and a half and still snowing '' .
the wilder weather always provides the opportunity for a good if you 've got one of what it 's like where you are you can send it in via twitter , facebook or email .
author: Andrew Barton
BBC Local Live, York
